sentences.sentence: His real name was Sabri al-Banna, but he became widely known by his nom de guerre, Abu Nidal.
sentences.translation: 他的真名是萨布里-爱版纳，但以他的化名阿布-尼达尔广为人知。

sentences.sentence: Only one Cylon raider ship was named by the Viper pilots. What was its nom DE guerre?
sentences.translation: 仅有一艘赛昂袭击机被毒蛇战机飞行员冠上名字。它的名字是？
